mapper.select: SELECT A.RNUM AS RNUM ,A.RSUBJECT AS RSUBJECT ,A.RPHOTO AS RPHOTO ,A.RHIT AS RHIT ,NVL((SELECT COUNT(LNUM) FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_LIKE" L WHERE A.RNUM = L.LIKETHIS AND L.LIKEYN = 'Y'), 0) AS LIKECNT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_RECIPE" A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 8 ORDER BY A.RNUM DESC

SELECT A.TNUM AS TNUM ,A.TSUBJECT AS TSUBJECT ,A.TPHOTO AS TPHOTO ,A.THIT AS THIT ,NVL((SELECT COUNT(LNUM) FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_LIKE" L WHERE A.TNUM = L.LIKETHIS AND L.LIKEYN = 'Y'), 0) AS LIKECNT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_TIP" A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 8 ORDER BY A.TNUM DESC

SELECT A.CNUM AS CNUM ,A.CSUBJECT AS CSUBJECT ,A.CCONTENT AS CCONTENT ,A.CHIT AS CHIT ,NVL((SELECT COUNT(CNUM) FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_LIKE" L WHERE A.CNUM = L.LIKETHIS AND L.LIKEYN = 'Y'), 0) AS LIKECNT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_COMMUNITY" A WHERE A.DELETEYN ='Y' AND A.MNUM is not Null AND ROWNUM <= 8 ORDER BY A.CNUM DESC

SELECT A.NNUM AS NNUM ,A.NSUBJECT AS NSUBJECT ,A.NCONTENT AS NCONTENT ,A.NHIT AS NHIT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_NOTICE" A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 8 ORDER BY A.NNUM DESC

SELECT A.MNUM ,A.MNICK ,A.MPROFILE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" A WHERE A.DELETEYN ='Y' AND A.MGRADE = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 14 ORDER BY A.MNUM ASC

SELECT RECIPECNT ,COMMUNITYCNT ,TIPCNT ,MEMBERCNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(A.RNUM) AS RECIPECNT FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_RECIPE" A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y') ,(SELECT COUNT(B.CNUM) AS COMMUNITYCNT FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_COMMUNITY" B WHERE B.DELETEYN = 'Y') ,(SELECT COUNT(C.TNUM) AS TIPCNT FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_TIP" C WHERE C.DELETEYN = 'Y') ,(SELECT COUNT(D.MNUM) AS MEMBERCNT FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" D WHERE D.DELETEYN = 'Y')
SELECT A.MNUM AS MNUM ,A.MNICK AS MNICK ,A.MGRADE AS MGRADE ,A.MPROFILE AS MPROFILE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" A WHERE A.MNUM = #{mnum} AND A.MGRADE = '1' AND A.DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.MNUM DESC

SELECT B.RNUM AS RNUM ,B.RSUBJECT AS RSUBJECT ,B.RPHOTO AS RPHOTO ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE FROM (SELECT MNUM ,MNICK ,MGRADE ,MPROFILE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND MNUM = #{mnum} AND MGRADE = '1' ) A ,(SELECT RNUM ,RSUBJECT ,RPHOTO ,MNUM ,INSERTDATE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_RECIPE" WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND MNUM = #{mnum} ) B WHERE A.MNUM = B.MNUM ORDER BY B.RNUM DESC

SELECT B.TNUM AS TNUM ,B.TSUBJECT AS TSUBJECT ,B.TPHOTO AS TPHOTO ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE FROM (SELECT MNUM ,MNICK ,MGRADE ,MPROFILE ,INSERTDATE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND MNUM = #{mnum} AND MGRADE = '1' ) A ,(SELECT TNUM ,TSUBJECT ,TPHOTO ,INSERTDATE ,MNUM FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_TIP" WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND MNUM = #{mnum}) B WHERE A.MNUM = B.MNUM ORDER BY B.TNUM DESC

SELECT B.CNUM AS CNUM ,B.CSUBJECT AS CSUBJECT ,B.CPHOTO AS CPHOTO ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE FROM (SELECT MNUM ,MNICK ,MGRADE ,MPROFILE ,INSERTDATE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND MNUM = #{mnum} AND MGRADE = '1' ) A ,(SELECT CNUM ,CSUBJECT ,CPHOTO ,INSERTDATE ,MNUM FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_COMMUNITY" WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND MNUM = #{mnum} ) B WHERE A.MNUM = B.MNUM ORDER BY B.CNUM DESC

SELECT
A.RNUM AS NUM ,A.RSUBJECT AS SUBJECT ,A.RPHOTO AS PHOTO ,A.RHIT AS HIT ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE
B.TNUM AS NUM ,B.TSUBJECT AS SUBJECT ,B.TPHOTO AS PHOTO ,B.THIT AS HIT ,TO_CHAR(B.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE
C.CNUM AS NUM ,C.CSUBJECT AS SUBJECT
,(SELECT M.MNICK FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" M WHERE C.MNUM = M.MNUM) AS NICK ,C.CHIT AS HIT ,TO_CHAR(C.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE
D.NNUM AS NUM ,D.NSUBJECT AS SUBJECT
,D.NHIT AS HIT ,TO_CHAR(D.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE
,NVL((SELECT COUNT(LNUM) FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_LIKE" L WHERE RNUM TNUM CNUM NNUM = L.LIKETHIS AND L.LIKEYN = 'Y'), 0) AS LIKECNT FROM
"ORCLICT00"."ICT_RECIPE" A
"ORCLICT00"."ICT_TIP" B
(SELECT CNUM ,CSUBJECT ,MNUM ,INSERTDATE ,CHIT ,DELETEYN FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_COMMUNITY" ORDER BY CHIT DESC) C
"ORCLICT00"."ICT_NOTICE" D
WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 8
AND SYSDATE - INSERTDATE = 1
AND SYSDATE - INSERTDATE < 8
AND SYSDATE - INSERTDATE < 31
ORDER BY HIT DESC
ORDER BY INSERTDATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.RNUM RNUM ,A.RSUBJECT RSUBJECT ,A.RCONTENT RCONTENT ,A.RPHOTO RPHOTO ,A.RJERYO RJERYO ,A.RTIME RTIME ,A.RPERSON RPERSON ,A.RDIFF RDIFF ,A.RCATEGORY RCATEGORY ,A.WARNING WARNING ,A.MNUM MNUM ,A.RHIT RHIT ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE ,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.RNUM DESC)/#{pageSize}) AS pagesize ,COUNT(A.RNUM) OVER() AS totalCount FROM ICT_RECIPE A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.MNUM = #{mnum} ORDER BY A.RNUM DESC ) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.TNUM TNUM ,A.TSUBJECT TSUBJECT ,A.TCONTENT TCONTENT ,A.TPHOTO TPHOTO ,A.TCATEGORY TCATEGORY ,A.WARNING WARNING ,A.MNUM MNUM ,A.THIT THIT ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE ,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.TNUM DESC)/#{pageSize}) AS pagesize ,COUNT(A.TNUM) OVER() AS totalCount FROM ICT_TIP A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.MNUM = #{mnum} ORDER BY A.TNUM DESC ) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.CNUM CNUM ,A.CSUBJECT CSUBJECT ,A.CCONTENT CCONTENT ,A.CPHOTO CPHOTO ,A.WARNING WARNING ,A.MNUM MNUM ,A.CHIT CHIT ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE ,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.CNUM DESC)/#{pageSize}) AS pagesize ,COUNT(A.CNUM) OVER() AS totalCount FROM ICT_COMMUNITY A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.MNUM = #{mnum} ORDER BY A.CNUM DESC ) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage}
